sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The memorie of the most worthie and renowmed Bernard Stuart, Lord D'Aubigni renewed VVhereunto are added vvishes presented to the Prince at his creation. By Walter Quin, seruant to his Highnesse. Quin, Walter.
[68] p., [2] folded leaves
Printed by George Purslow, London : 1619.
In verse. Signatures: A-H⁴ I² . Running title reads: The memory of Bernard L. D'Aubigni. The folded leaves contain anagrams. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======
The memorie of the most worthie and renowmed Bernard Stuart, Lord D'Aubigni renewed VVhereunto are added vvishes presented to the Prince at his creation. By Walter Quin, seruant to his Highnesse. Quin, Walter.
[68] p., [2] folded leaves
Printed by George Purslow, London : 1619.
In verse. Signatures: A-H⁴ I² . Running title reads: The memory of Bernard L. D'Aubigni. The folded leaves contain anagrams. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
